DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the status of myelofibrosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A partial or complete replacement of the bone marrow stroma by fibrous tissue.  It can be a primary bone marrow lesion as part of the chronic myeloproliferative disorders (chronic idiopathic myelofibrosis), a manifestation of acute myeloid leukemia (acute panmyelosis with myelofibrosis), or a secondary phenomenon due to bone marrow involvement by a metastatic tumor (e.g., metastatic breast carcinoma). --2003_An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A partial or complete replacement of the bone marrow stroma by fibrous tissue.  It can be a primary bone marrow lesion as part of the chronic myeloproliferative disorders (chronic idiopathic myelofibrosis), a manifestation of acute myeloid leukemia (acute panmyelosis with myelofibrosis), or a secondary phenomenon due to bone marrow involvement by a metastatic tumor (e.g., metastatic breast carcinoma). --2003

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A partial or complete replacement of the bone marrow stroma by fibrous tissue. ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Return to the normal structure and/or function, e.g. the subsidence of a pathologic process, as the subsidence of an inflammatory lesion or new growth.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not severe or strong; far from extreme; not serious enough to endanger life.

Concepts.definition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Intensely or extremely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality, or extent; life threatening.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Increase; a process of becoming larger or more numerous or more important.: Or; used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: In an unchanged or similar condition.
